content.p: Persons required to file annual tax performance reports under RCW 82.32.534 must electronically file with the department all reports, returns, and any other forms or information the department requires in an electronic format as provided or approved by the department. As used in this section, "returns" has the same meaning as "return" in RCW 82.32.050 .
Any report, return, or any other form or information required to be filed in an electronic format under subsection
of this section is not filed until received by the department in an electronic format.
The department may waive the electronic filing requirement in subsection

of this section for good cause shown. [ 2017 c 135 s 4 ; 2010 c 114 s 136 ; 2009 c 461 s 8 . Prior: 2008 c 81 s 14 ; 2008 c 15 s 8 ; prior: 2007 c 54 s 23 ; 2007 c 54 s 22 ; prior: 2006 c 354 s 16 ; 2006 c 300 s 11 ; 2006 c 178 s 9 ; 2006 c 177 s 9 ; 2006 c 84 s 8 ; 2005 c 514 s 1002 .] NOTES: Effective date — 2017 c 135: See note following RCW 82.32.534 .
